department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Networks Design Projects
course.description: The contents and course requirements are similar to those of Computer Science 144r, with the exception that students enrolled in Computer Science 244r are expected to do substantial system implementation and perform graduate-level work.
course.notes: Preference given to upper-class undergraduates or graduate students in computer science or in business who are proficient in computer programming or in business software.
